name: timeous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A timeous action is done quickly or before the time when it needed to be done: She helped to guide the project to a successful and timeous conclusion. Please ensure the timeous posting of your application.
More examplesFewer examplesMy lawyers kept me informed of the progress of my application in a very timeous manner.Our service can enhance your communication with clients by sending timeous and relevant text messages.There is a lot depending on the safe and timeous delivery of this document.
